com.device.util.connectionmanager

Interface IConnectionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectionManagerImpl

    public interface IConnectionManager
    This interface provides the utility required for creating Http Connection and then, generate Request and process Response.
    Author:
    raunak

    • Method Detail

      • generateRequest

        java.lang.Object generateRequest(java.lang.String url,
                               ConnectionManagerImpl.RequestMethod requestMethod,
                               ConnectionManagerImpl.ContentType contentType,
                               java.lang.Class<?> representation,
                               java.lang.String... input)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        RestClientException
        This method generates HttpServletRequest and returns the processed response
        Parameters:
        String - URL to be invoked
        RequestMethod - Request Method for the request
        ContentType - Content Type for the request
        Class - of the Response to be stored in
        String... - input Request parameters
        Returns:
        Object of Type passed in or null if the input parameter are invalid
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException -

        In case there some errors encountered while creating the connection

        RestClientException -

        If the response is not 200. It binds the error in this exception
